participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and sociable, enjoys sports and playing with friends.
participant_1.background: I've one brother. I like tacos. I've three sisters. I love dogs.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves dolls and playing outdoors.
participant_2.background: I like to play with my dolls. My best friend lives next door. I don't pick up my toys. I'm four.

content.text: I like playing cricket.my best friends also live with me.i pickup my balls.i am four
